body_text:
Romeo and Juliet face off in this once-in-a-lifetime attraction
when the soon-to-be wed
Joanice Lima
and
Christopher Adams
collide in a must-see "CREAMation" showdown.
Marriage is more than a single ring and on May 12, 2012,
the
ECD
world will see why.
body_html:
Romeo and Juliet face off in this once-in-a-lifetime attraction
when the soon-to-be wed Joanice Lima and Christopher Adams
collide in a must-see "CREAMation" showdown.

Marriage is more than a single ring and on May 12, 2012,
the ECD world will see why.
